description: Sweet, sticky and delicious, this fruity sauce is perfect drizzled over barbecued veg, pork, fish or beef.
keywords: Sauce,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Spring,Nov 2020,Sesame free,Cherry,High fibre,Wheat free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Low fat,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Cherry Barbecue Sauce Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place all ingredients in a medium-sized saucepan over high heat and bring to the boil. Once boiling, reduce heat to low and simmer for 20 minutes, stirring occasionally, to allow sauce to thicken slightly. Transfer to a food processor or blender and process for 10 seconds or until smooth. Allow to cool slightly before serving.
